Text: Economic Capital Resources and iConference ArchiveCAPITAL iCONFERENCE ARCHIVE The archives for our iConference Practical Considerations in Measuring Economic Capital are now ready You can view the polling results slides event summary and live replay at cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCJuAz ECONOMIC CAPITAL REFERENCE MATERIALS We also have assembled a list of resources on economic capital Learn how economic risk relates to the problem of credit portfolio managment cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCKrAx Read a quick summary of the differences between various vendor models of portfolio economic capital cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCXFAS Read a much more detailed analysis of how portfolio models differ including equations cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCXGAT cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCXHAU Learn how some banks are using economic capital to inform their riskadjusted pricing and business line investment strategies cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCXIAV View two ERisk client case studies showing how economic capital measurement methodologies relate to business problems cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFBigAH cgibinfloyeHkqBHCKeCjFCXJAW To change your subscription preferences please go to your account at utilaccountasp If you have never subscribed to our services but would like to do so you may register at utilregisterasp To be reminded of your password go to utilforgotpwdasp
